name: Sirindhorn School of Prosthetics and Orthotics (SSPO), Faculty of Medicine Siriraj Hospital, Mahidol University, Thailand
address: 14 Arun-Amarin Rd.
service: Custom-made upper and lower limb prostheses, orthoses at various levels such as upper and lower limb orthoses, spinal orthoses, foot orthoses, wheelchair seating, and shoes for patients and people with disabilities.
requirements:
-Before contacting PO clinic, the new patients must register with the hospital and receive a prescription or referral from doctors such as physiatrist or orthopedist.
-The clinic mainly provides service through appointment system. 
-Due to the custom-made service the patient must visit onsite for several appointments including assessment, measurement and casting, initial and final fitting, delivery and follow-up.
